column5: Went down to the local no-fishing area yesterday, to see if our little friends have arrived yet...          This little male got beached....    ...but he did manage to get off this step & back into the main flow.    2 for the price of 1    Closeup on the bottom fish...    Best for last...    I hope you enjoyed it. Hopefully, I get out again soon and can share some more.  p.-
Great shots as usual Paul! Ches
Very nice....sun is about right ...right now so I think I'll grab the camera and see if I can catch some.....great shots Paulus....love the last one
Exciting photos! Just what everyone needs before opener!
I like the girl in photo #2. So clean and fresh !
27 days....27 more days the river mouths are getting a little too familiar
Those are some amazing shots you got! I just picked up my first fly rod... can't wait to try and get a fish with it.
Great photos, nothin more gratifying then watchin steelhead on their annual migration, and one of the more photogenic species for sure
Paul, those pics are awesome man!!!
Love the pics ! Thanx for posting them Paulus
Almost as gratifying as having one on the end of the line  - but they are very fun to watch.  Thanks Bill! Coming from you, that's a gold star .  p.-
